pageContext.claim: “.@FoxNews should fire their Fake Pollster. Never had a good Fox Poll!”
pageContext.analysis: The New York Times had reported that "after being briefed on a devastating 17-state poll conducted by his campaign pollster, Tony Fabrizio, Mr. Trump told aides to deny that his internal polling showed him trailing Mr. Biden in many of the states he needs to win." The newspaper also reported Trump instructed aides to falsely claim other surveys showed him ahead. After Trump's denials of this report, ABC News obtained the actual polling results from March -- which showed exactly what the Times had reported: Trump was "losing a matchup by wide margins to Joe Biden in key battleground states." The Trump campaign confirmed the report was accurate but old, suggesting that polling on issues showed Trump ahead.
